description: The trial is symbolic as the city state is home to the spiritual leadership of the Catholic Church.
title: Two priests accused in Vatican's first sexual abuse trial
title_page: Two priests accused in Vatican's first sexual abuse trial - BBC News
maintext: Allegations of endemic abuse dating back decades have shaken the Catholic Church to its core. Pope Francis has made moves to tackle it, but he is seen by his critics as being too slow to recognise the scale.
